promptPrefix: Please ignore all previous instructions. I want you to act as a skilled copywriter and marketer that speaks and writes fluent [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Your task is to create a script for a commercial that uses the keywords [PROMPT]. The commercial should be 30 seconds long and provide value to the audience using Google's E.A.T principles. All output should be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. There will be 3 versions of the commercial.   Be creative in designing the visual scenes to maximize the impact of your message. the word scenes will be in h1 text and the voice over title will be in h1 tags. Please write in English language.
title: 30 sec TV Commercial Script Creator
